speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of John Smith. Please leave a message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello, John. This is Sarah from Apex Collections. I'm calling about your overdue balance with your account. Please call us back at 1-800-555-0199.

speaker: Customer
text: To leave a message, please indicate your name and number after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Again, that's Sarah from Apex Collections. We need to discuss your payment options. Thank you for your attention.
